metadata.description: Known malicious Chrome extension campaigns identified in open web search by researchers

vk_styles_2026.description: Malware campaign targeting VKontakte (VK) users. Extensions pose as VK customization tools but fetch and execute remote code from VK profile metadata (dead drop) and GitHub (2vk.github.io). Capabilities: CSRF token manipulation (remixsec_redir), auto-subscription to attacker VK group (75% per session), 30-day account settings reset, donation tracking. C2 via vk.com/m0nda profile meta tags and GitHub repo '-' file 'C'. Yandex metric R-A-1686158 (computed to evade static detection).
c2_infrastructure: VK profile vk.com/m0nda (meta tag dead drop)

ttps.exfiltration: Remote code load via fetch + eval/Function

sources.title: VK Styles: 500K Users Infected by Chrome Extensions That Hijack VKontakte Accounts
